ygData.subject: Can you enchant stacks or Silver at Once?
ygData.msgSnippet: Not yet 16th so I was wondering if you can enchant an entire stack of silver at once, or if you have to do it 1 bar at a time? Charles Xezol - Lvl 14 Gnome Mag
ygData.messageBody:
Not yet 16th so I was wondering if you can enchant an entire stack of
silver at once, or if you have to do it 1 bar at a time?

Charles


Xezol - Lvl 14 Gnome Mag on E'Ci
